MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This latest version has improved reliability and performance, tuned user interface and resource usage make it even better tool to communicate, chat and collaborate over a network. Windows XP users will appreciate support of new XP features.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 8 MB RAM, 2 MB HDD space, a LAN connection

English.Char_Desc_45: Send and receive network messages instantly
English.Char_Desc_80: Peer-to-peer instant messaging and files transfering for LANs/WANs/intranets
English.Char_Desc_250: It is the real-time messaging system specifically designed for business Intranets. Using a peer-to-peer architecture, it delivers text messages from workstation to workstation at real-time, without the typical delay associated with e-mail.
English.Char_Desc_450: Vypress Messenger lets you instantly exchange text messages with other users across the Internet or any TCP/IP network. This utility is an excellent replacement for the "WinPopup" utility that comes with Windows. It is compatible with the SMB protocol, which allows messages to be received from Windows 95/98 WinPopup, Windows NT Messenger Service, Linux and Novell NetWare. There are message filtering options and a mail notification option.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
It is the real-time messaging system specifically designed for business Intranets. Using a peer-to-peer architecture, it delivers text messages from workstation to workstation at real-time, without the typical delay associated with conventional e-mail.
It is also much quicker and less obtrusive than making telephone call. Vypress Messenger introduces fully compatibility with standard WinPopup from Win95/98, Windows NT Alerter service, Novell NetWare broadcasts and any Unix SMB clients. VyPRESSs firm technology AutoRetries allows to automatically sending the messages to computers, which currently is not available in a local network without using any servers. Designed to meet the need of todays most demanding businesses, Vypress Messenger offers the highest level of real-world usability, ease of learning and operation, and ergonomics.
